title: Procurement of Thirty (30) Terminal Tractors for the Jaya Container Terminal of the Sri Lanka Ports Authority
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of Ports & Shipping and Southern Development to commence the procurement process for the purchase of Thirty (30) Terminal Tractors for the Jaya Container Terminal of the Sri Lanka Ports Authority under the Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, following the International Competitive Bidding Procedure, was approved by the Cabinet.
